Text: I really would love to have this! Please seed ... (Yes my friends, I seed at minimum as much as I download.)

Ask what you guys would like and i will see if i can help, i have about 60 gigs of otr, many complete series, however my upload is very very slow, so i will only do requests, and you must have patience lol, i can split them to somewhat, let me know
i do not have the saint, but i do have a lot of detective, police, scifi, suspence, mystery, and so forth, also a variety of comedy
